name: spam-filter
about: A spam filter to separate fake messages from real messages.

name: Intelligent-Agents-Play-Rummy
about: Experiment for our research paper under HW0228 Scientific Communication II

name: Databases
about: A database to handle transactions for an online shopping platform. Coded in SQL server.

name: Video-Game-Credit-Extraction
about: A web application to extract the end credits from game credit videos. The user interface was built using ReactJS and the backend framework built using Flask along with mongoDB to store data.

name: Data-Analysis-with-Computer
about: Project aiming to analyse the expenditure trends of people based on their income as well factors such as marital status, education level etc,. This was done in order to aid the marketing strategy for a company dealing with online shopping.

name: AI
about: This project consists of the assignments as part of the course requirements. The assignment is coded in Prolog, a logical programming language for AI.

name: JobsUpply
about: A web application to suggest jobs to students and fresh graduates based on their skills and their education field. The application also suggests courses for the users to help them learn new skills that may be required for jobs that they look for.

name: Course-Registration-System
about: Console based application codes in Java. The application enables students to register for their courses as well as use features such as changing class timings and adding or dropping courses.

name: Genome-searching-Algorithms
about: The aim of this project is to propose an algorithm to get find sub sequences in a genome sequence and compare efficiency of the proposed algorithms.

name: Graph-Algorithms
about: This project aims to find the closest hospital to every city given a real word road network. The entire road network is represented as a graph with each city and hospital represented as nodes and the edges representing the roads connecting them.

name: Music-Moods
about: A music recommendation system to suggest the top 30 similar songs based on sentiment of the songs.

name: Canteen-information-system
about: An application to view the food menu for different stalls in NTU food canteens.

name: CZ2002-OODP-STARS-Planner
about: The aim of this project is to develop a console based application for students to register and manage their course timetable for a particular semester.
